::KitKat::

She was enjoying her time in the sun.  The cold winds blew from the 
north and smelled of clean air and....and.. wolf!

She caught the scent again.  She knew that te wolf had to be near by.
She put her nose to the wind and and follwed it a few miles.  

She called up Quickstrike on her commlink. 
"Hey ya Quickstrike.  I'll be out here a little longer than I 
originally planned.  I got a scent trail of anotehr wolf out here and 
I want to follw it."  She closed her link and started off after the 
scent trail.
